data_quality.title: Breathing
data_quality.message:
1) Reset the application, wait 15 seconds and check it again.

2) Restart the phone, wait about 1-2 minutes and check it again.

3) Tighten the chest band so it fits snugly under the armpits.

4) Make sure the cables marked in green and purple are plugged in all the way.

5) Charge the white box.

data_quality.title: Heart Rate
data_quality.message:
1) Adjust the position of the electrodes on the body.

2)  Make sure all cable connections are secure.

3)  Reset the application, wait 15 seconds and check again.

4) Restart the phone, wait one minute and check again.

5) Make sure the chest sensor is charged and powered ON.

data_quality.title: Left Wrist
data_quality.message:
1) Reset the application, wait 15 seconds and check again.

2) Restart the phone, wait one minute and check again.

3) Make sure the wristband is charged.

data_quality.title: Right Wrist
data_quality.message:
1) Reset the application, wait 15 seconds and check again.

2) Restart the phone, wait one minute and check again.

3) Make sure the wristband is charged.
